name: Super Stardust Ultra
description:
The fate of the galaxy is in your hands.

Blast enemy ships and deadly asteroids into oblivion in this rapid-fire space shoot ’em-up.

The Super Stardust™ franchise explodes onto PlayStation®4 for the first time as the galaxy’s biggest baddie launches an interstellar war in a plot to take over.

Defend the solar system as the last remaining star fighter − you’ll need cat-like reflexes, split-second timing and pure arcade skill to make every shot count.

Video output in Full HD 1080p requires 1080p native display.

1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
